hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well MQ Map Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
